alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 04 at 2:06AM MST until May 04 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MST /10 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST /7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Including the cites of Valle, Keams Canyon, Kaibito, Tuba City, Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, St. Johns, Springerville, Dilkon, Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...From 9 AM MST /10 AM MDT/ this morning to 6 PM MST /7 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Localized areas of blowing dust may develop over lower elevations of northeast Arizona.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
